job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations, POCs, and evaluations through coordination of the physical and human resources of Dataiku and the customer; lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action to prove that Dataiku delivers the needed value better than our competitors
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading a team to execute a plan and demonstrate a product's value, which aligns with the software development and integration aspect of proving a solution's worth, even if it's not direct coding.

job_tasks.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical guidance on solutions relates to the integration and understanding of how software/platforms work, fitting into the broader scope of software development and integration support.

job_tasks.phrase: Assist in sales pipeline building activities including attendance at live and/or virtual trade-shows and industry conferences, working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution and other activities specified by sales and pre-sales management
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding sales processes and working with marketing and sales management, which falls under business understanding and strategy alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide regular updates on your activities to support accurate regional forecasting, participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions, participate in departmental activities like GTM or SE offsites.
job_tasks.justification: Providing updates for forecasting and participating in go-to-market (GTM) activities requires understanding business objectives and strategic planning.

soft_skills.phrase: Answer questions and provide technical guidance to the customer's technical team regarding the demonstrated or evaluated solutions
soft_skills.justification: Providing technical guidance to a customer's team is a clear example of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: working with marketing and or partners on campaign design and execution
soft_skills.justification: Working with marketing and partners on campaign design and execution requires strong collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: participate in continuous development activities that expand or build on your knowledge and skills with new product releases, GTM programs and initiatives & relevant enablement sessions
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions continuous development and building knowledge/skills with new releases and programs, which is a direct indicator of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the combined team to carry out the agreed upon course of action
soft_skills.justification: Leading a team to execute a plan demonstrates ownership and initiative.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses on executing demonstrations, providing technical guidance, assisting in sales pipeline building, and participating in marketing/GTM activities. There are no explicit mentions of developing, fine-tuning, or integrating AI/ML models or generative AI specific tasks. The core responsibilities align with a traditional software engineering or solutions engineering role that supports sales and product demonstration, rather than a role directly involved in AI/ML development or specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on pre-sales technical support, demonstrations, and sales enablement. There is no ambiguity regarding AI/ML specific tasks, making the classification straightforward.
